text:
I had an excellent experience at IELTS University. Jonathan, our instructor, was incredibly knowledgeable and shared invaluable study techniques that made preparing for the IELTS exam much more manageable. His years of experience really showed in how he could pinpoint common mistakes and help us improve quickly.
The study method he taught us was practical and effective - I particularly appreciated how he broke down each section of the test into digestible parts. His approach helped build both my confidence and competence in all four skills: reading, writing, listening, and speaking.
Highly recommend this class to anyone preparing for IELTS. The investment was definitely worth it!

I am planning to take the IELTS, but I didnâ€™t know how to commence my preparation. I researched various institutions and stumbled upon IELTS University by Jonathan. The reviews were compelling, so I decided to enroll in his class. Through his instruction, I uncovered many essential factors to consider before taking the test. I learned how to discern and tackle challenging questions in the reading and listening sections. We were supplied with an ample array of resources for vocabulary and grammar enhancement, among other aspects. If you require preparation before sitting for the exam, as I did, I highly recommend Jonathanâ€™s class; the depth of information and support is exceptionally beneficial.

Thank you, Jonathan, for your remarkably enlightening instruction. I sincerely appreciate your invaluable assistance.

In a world full of information and rapid pace, I often feel overwhelmed and off track while preparing for my IELTS test. Jonathan's classes provide structured methods that help me study efficiently, especially given my tight schedule and limited time.

As a student who values the learning experience, I want to express my appreciation for the exceptional teaching provided by Jonathan. He excels in making complex concepts easily understandable through clear explanations and engaging examples. His interactive teaching style promotes active participation and collaboration, enhancing critical thinking skills. In addition to providing us with plenty of  learning materials, he also encourages us to participate in Zoom classes even after the course. This personalised approach to teaching ensures that each student receives the necessary assistance and encouragement to succeed.

Jonathan has put in a lot of efforts in teaching the students how to get higher scores in IELTS. The teaching materials that he prepared are very structured and details. I would highly recommend those who want to get high score in IELTS, don't hesitate to attend Jonathan's classes.
